column4: thanks, using 9.10 on a eeepc 1000he, all was well until today.  after entering password at the promp the system reboots back to the password prompt.
if i've have separate partitions for swap, home, boot and tmp can i reinstall without over writing the home partition?
yes. chose the advanced install and make sure not to format the partitons you want to keep
when you get to the partitioning part
